titleStmt.title: Faunus and Melliflora or, The original of our English satyres. Iohn Weeuer
titleStmt.author: Weever, John, 1576-1632.
Horace. Satires. 1. English.
Persius. Works. Satire 1. English.
Juvenal. Satura 1. English.

notesStmt.note: Includes translations of the first satires of Horace, Persius, and Juvenal.
Reproduction of a photostat of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
